'''Unknown Sanctuary''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during the {{Quest|A Lamenter at Fate's End}} and {{Quest|Portended Fate|showType = 0}}

==Walkthrough==
# Near the entrance of the domain: {{Enemy|Hilichurl|x=5}}
#* These enemies are optional. They will also disappear after they or the player walks into the portal.
# After the first teleportation:
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy|Large Hydro Slime|x=2}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy|Large Electro Slime|x=2}}
# After the second teleportation: {{Enemy List|Large Hydro Slime*2;Large Pyro Slime}}
# Shortly ahead of the previous enemies: {{Enemy|Hilichurl|x=3}}
#* These enemies are optional. They will also disappear after they or the player walks into the portal.
# Up the stairs: {{Enemy List|Large Electro Slime*2;Mutant Electro Slime}}
# On the bridge: {{Enemy List|Large Hydro Slime;Cryo Slime*2}}
